name: Magic Corgi
description:
Your main character is a fluffy corgi dog and you have an exciting journey in a magical forest.
Explore different levels, look for items and dodge various obstacles.
How to manage? It's simple - pull the dog by the tail and fly in the right direction.

Magic Corgi - 2D arcade game. A precision platformer in which it is worth trying to complete each of the 10 levels, because all of them are stuffed with various obstacles that can injure a harmless dog!

Game Features:
- exciting process
- good physics
- colorful graphics
